page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: A{suburb of Birmingham,}mainly {residential.}Major growth took place between {c.1900-60}and began with private developments and then council infilling c.1930-60.{Home}may be a detached,semi-det.(the majority),or terraced house,or low/high rise flat. There is little manufacturing industry.{Employment}in retail and service industry is common. Finding new employ is difficult. { Bus and private car}provide transport along the many minor roads. { Open space}remains in the form of less structured areas like Warley Woods and the more structured sports arenas. { Physical changes}include house and derelict land renovation. A{multi-ethnic population and new {technologies}have both meant changes to life styles.
